BaseTemplate.description: Starter code for your Nextjs Boilerplate with Tailwind CSS

Index.meta_description: Next js Boilerplate is the perfect starter code for your project. Build your React application with the Next.js framework.

About.about_paragraph: Welcome to our About page! We are a team of passionate individuals dedicated to creating amazing software.

Portfolio.presentation: Welcome to my portfolio page! Here you will find a carefully curated collection of my work and accomplishments. Through this portfolio, I'm to showcase my expertise, creativity, and the value I can bring to your projects.

PortfolioSlug.content: Created a set of promotional materials and branding elements for a corporate event. Crafted a visually unified theme, encompassing a logo, posters, banners, and digital assets. Integrated the client's brand identity while infusing it with a contemporary and innovative approach. Garnered favorable responses from event attendees, resulting in a successful event with heightened participant engagement and increased brand visibility.

SignIn.meta_description: Seamlessly sign in to your account with our user-friendly login process.

SignUp.meta_description: Effortlessly create an account through our intuitive sign-up process.

about.title: 关于Carina

about.detail3:

carousel.text1: 发行店铺的专厲积分卡/优惠券
carousel.text2: 交换手中的积分/优惠卡
carousel.text3: 最贴近大众生活的Web3.0体验

box1.text3: 无需登录个人信息即可创建账户，分秒上手

box2.text2: 定制发行专属积分/优惠券
box2.text3: 只按使用功能次数收取低廉手续费，无月租

box3.text2: 收到的积分/优惠券可以和其他账户自由交換

box1.text4: 无固定费用，按发起交互收费

box2.text4: 聚合不同积分，省去繁琐流程

box3.text2: 支持积分间兑换和发行

box4.text2: 数据不会消失且无法被篡改
box4.text4: 可选择自身信息的公开范围
box4.text5: 公开信息产生的收益归自身所有
